statements: SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategy
SELECT strategy_name, start_time, end_time FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT area_id, strategy_name FROM LoadSheddingStrategy ORDER BY area_id DESC
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31'
SELECT area_id, status FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT area_id, strategy_name FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Peak%'
SELECT strategy_name, start_time, end_time FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE status = FALSE AND start_time < '2022-01-01'
SELECT area_id, strategy_name, start_time, end_time FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE end_time > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_time ASC
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategy WHERE area_id IN (101, 102, 103)
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategies;
SELECT strategy_name, data_source FROM LoadSheddingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeData WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, demand, status FROM RealTimeData WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, data_source FROM LoadSheddingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, data_source FROM LoadSheddingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeData WHERE status = 'active' AND demand > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, data_source FROM LoadSheddingStrategies WHERE data_source LIKE 'API%';
SELECT strategy_id, MAX(demand) AS max_demand FROM RealTimeData GROUP BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM load_shedding_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, load_threshold FROM load_shedding_strategies ORDER BY load_threshold DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, data_value, timestamp FROM real_time_data WHERE sensor_id = 'sensor001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, load_threshold, strategy_description FROM load_shedding_strategies;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE sensor_id = 'sensor001';
SELECT strategy_name, load_threshold FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE load_threshold > 50;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM load_shedding_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, avoidance_time FROM load_shedding_strategies JOIN blackout_avoidance ON load_shedding_strategies.strategy_id = blackout_avoidance.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingZone;
SELECT zone_name, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM LoadSheddingZone;
SELECT zone_name, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM LoadSheddingZone WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM LoadSheddingStrategy;
SELECT L.zone_name, P.consumption_amount, P.measurement_time FROM LoadSheddingZone L JOIN PowerConsumption P ON L.zone_id = P.zone_id;
SELECT * FROM LoadSheddingZone;
SELECT zone_name, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM LoadSheddingZone WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM LoadSheddingStrategy;
SELECT zone_id, consumption_amount, measurement_time FROM PowerConsumption ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;

SELECT zone_name, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time, strategy_name FROM LoadSheddingZone JOIN StrategyZoneMapping ON LoadSheddingZone.zone_id = StrategyZoneMapping.zone_id JOIN LoadSheddingStrategy ON StrategyZoneMapping.strategy_id = LoadSheddingStrategy.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT load_amount, voltage, frequency FROM real_time_data WHERE load_amount > 1000
SELECT message_text, sender, receiver FROM alert_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT start_time, end_time, description FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3
SELECT * FROM blackout_history WHERE cause LIKE '%weather%'
SELECT * FROM load_shedding_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT strategy_id, start_time, end_time FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT description FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Emergency%'
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_type = 'SMS' AND phone_number LIKE '%1234%'
SELECT strategy_name, end_time, start_time FROM load_shedding_strategies WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01'
